dmca.title: Worldlabe.com - Misuse of Microsoft Trademark
dmca.body:
We represent Microsoft Corporation in trademark matters and write to ask your assitance in a addressing a trademark issue on your Worldlabel.com website.

Microsoft is the owner of the Microsoft Office Lgog trademark that is protected by US trademark registration no 1982562 (copy enclosed)

...........
............

We have no objections to your site other than its use of the Microsoft Office Logo. One the logo has been removed, we will consider this matter resolved.
